name: Ball Catch 2021
description:
In this game you have to shoot a ball without touching the spinning obstacles.

If you shoot the ball 5 times in a row the game gets faster and more challenging.

Kids really enjoy the game.

How to Play?

Tap the screen of the device at the right time to shoot the ball, ball will throw in the direction of the arrow, the objective is to throw ball outside of the spinning wheel.
